basics.name: Suyash Pandey
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: Hello Everyone. I am Suyash Pandey, an engineering undergrad currently pursuing Electronics and Communication Engineering at Indian Institute of Information Technology, Kota. I live in Delhi-NCR region. I am a coding enthusiast and have a keen intereset in Web Development. Furthermore, I am an active coder on the well known platform Coderforces. The supreme goal in my life is to become a very successful and an honest man. Technically, I want to become a Software Development Engineer in a Product-based company.

publications.title: My Resume
publications.details: This would take you to a website which contains my resume comprising of the first semester.
publications.title: Smart Street Light using Arduino Uno
publications.details: I had developed a smart street light using Arduino Uno which would automatically glow if the light is not sufficient and falls below a minimum value and simulated the project using the website 'Tinkercad'. I have also uploaded a tutorial video of it's functioning on YouTube.
